nodes.text: The FA-4 pilot droid was a model of wheeled pilot droid in operation during the last decades of the Galactic Republic. It was the predecessor of the FA-5 valet droid, both of which were produced by SoroSuub.
One such droid piloted Count Dooku's solar sailer prior to and during the Clone Wars.
Later, in 19 BBY, FA-4 and FA-5 models could be seen working side-by-side at the Republic Executive Building after the Battle of Coruscant.
